nodes.name: Veloth's Judgement Concept Art Replacer by Articus
nodes.summary: Replaces daedric warhammer "Veloth's Judgement" with HQ model and HQ texture (2048 px) in concept art style, adds glowing elements.  All you need is to place conteining files to your Morrowind/Data Files directory. Enjoy the game and don't

nodes.name: Robe of the Lich Replacer by Articus
nodes.summary: Replaces Robe of the Lich HQ model and HQ texture (2048 px), adds glowing elements.  All you need is to place conteining files to your Morrowind/Data Files directory. Enjoy the game and don't forget to endorse! :)

nodes.name: Dagger of Symmachus Replacer by Articus and Hedgehog12
nodes.summary: Replaces Dagger of Symmachus with HQ model and HQ textures (1024 px), adds glowing elements and transparency. All you need is to place conteining files to your Morrowind/Data Files directory. Enjoy the game and don't forget to endorse! :)

nodes.name: Mace Of Slurring Replacer by Articus
nodes.summary: Replaces Mace Of Slurring with HQ model and HQ textures (1024 px), adds animated magical particles. Particles are flying in the air after Mace changes its position. All you need is to place conteining files to your Morrowind/Data Files

nodes.name: Staff of Hasedoki Replacer by Articus
nodes.summary: New model and textures for Staff of Hasedoki. Gem elements are glowing in the dark.All you need is to place conteining files to your Morrowind/Data directory.Enjoy the game! :)

nodes.name: Fang of Haynekhtnamet Replacer by Articus
nodes.summary: Replaces Fang of Haynekhtnamet with HQ model and HQ textures (1024/512 px) and adds glowing elements. All you need is to place conteining files to your Morrowind/Data Files directory. Enjoy the game and don't forget to endorse! :)

nodes.name: Skeleton for skinning and modding by Pherim
nodes.summary: Correct version of a human skeleton to make armor mods with or anything else. It has correct T-pose and proportions. Should be good for skinning and learning.

nodes.name: Spear of Bitter Mercy and Fork of Horripilation Replacer
nodes.summary: Replaces Spear of Bitter Mercy and Fork of Horripilation with HQ models and HQ textures (2048/1024 px).  All you need is to place conteining files to your Morrowind/Data Files directory. Enjoy the game and don't forget to endorse! :)

nodes.name: Savior's Sacrifice by Articus (TR)
nodes.summary: This mod replaces Savior's Hide models and textures and new armor parts, they can be found in Tarmiel Rebuilt DLC. All you need is to place conteining files to your Morrowind/Data directory and turn on .esp. Enjoy the game and don't forget
